Package sorcer.core.context

Interface Summary
ApplicationDescription  
AssociativeContext  
ContextAccessor ContextAccessor defines the signatures for interfacing with a dataContext storage repository.
ContextManagement Context Management provides methods for managing contexts over the network.
IndexedContext  
Positioning  
RemoteContextManagement  
SpaceContext  
 

Class Summary
ArrayContext The Array dataContext has an array like access to a service dataContext.
ContextLink Provides for service context linking.
ContextManagementAdapter Context Management provides methods for managing contexts over the network.
Contexts The Contexts class provides utility services to ServiceContext that are required by requestors such as the the SORCER graphical user interface and and any complex SORCER requestor or service provider.
ControlContext  
ListContext<T> ServiceContext implementing the java.util.List interface.
PositionalContext  
ServiceContext<T> Implements the base-level service context interface Context.
SharedAssociativeContext SpaceContext persists its dataContext nodes in a distributed array in JavaSpace with the name provided in the constructor.
SharedIndexedContext<T> ServiceContext implementing the java.util.List interface.
